prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Synth Pad, Bass, Piano, Chromatic Percussion, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
Guitar, Synth Pad, Bass, Piano, and Chromatic Percussion make up this song, but Drums are absent.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Guitar, Synth Pad, Bass, Piano, and Chromatic Percussion, but no Drums.

Style 3:
This piece is made up of Guitar, Synth Pad, Bass, Piano, and Chromatic Percussion - no Drums included.
